name: Holy Dove
description:
Holy Dove is a top-down shooter game .

It’s about  a man’s psychological problem caused by childhood traumas. He must go killing doves while going through the rooms of his old house remembering his traumatic past.

During the game  the world of the character changes between reality and his traumatic mind.  As above so below, as in heaven and  hell,  he will always be  surrounded  by doves and  his distorted mind.


Entrant: Sergiomlp (Sergio Gomez)
sergiomlp123@hotmail.com

Characters based on https://www.instagram.com/tw.ei/ 2d Art
